body.name: Silicone Kitchen Cooking Utensils Set, Umite Chef 22Pcs Heat Resistant Kitchen Utensils, Spatula, Spoon, Whisk, Dishwasher Safe Kitchen Utensil Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware(Khaki)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 34 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 34 mins
features: 【FOOD GRADE SILICONE BPA FREE!】Each cooking utensil is made entirely of food-grade silicone, BPA-free and odorless, We know that this is a health issue that concerns you and your family, and it is also the most important concern for every consumer. So We strictly control the production and quality of these cooking utensils. NOTE: It must be soaked for half an hour when it is used for the first time, and then exposed to the air for about 3 hours, the original smell of silica gel will disappear

【STAINLESS STEEL CORE & NO GAPS, ONE PIECE DESIGN】Each cooking utensils has a stainless-steel core to ensure long-term deformation and durability. Soft silicone outer layer will not scratch your pan, At the same time, the silicone with a fine particle feel is also anti slip, providing you with a comfortable grip. The stainless steel is wrapped in silicone to form a whole seamless silicone design, You don't need to worry about cleaning issues caused by any welding seams

【HIGHLY HEAT RESISTANT】One of the best things about Umite Chef silicone spatula kitchen utensils is its ability to withstand heat safely, each utensil is heat-resistant up to whopping 446°F and won’t melt (even leave it in the pot for a while) and our spatula head won't even become knicked or warped even at those extreme temperatures. This silicone cooking utensils does not react with food or beverages, Will not retain odors or colors when you use it for stirring based food products

【 EASY TO CLEAN &100% DISHWASHER SAFE】Seamless silicone design which is a major plus as there aren't any cracks or ridges to catch food or harbor anything that makes it super easy to clean. The sturdy silicone surface eliminates the worry about damage caused by machine washing to the product, Just put it in the dishwasher after use, and you will get a new set. This cookware utensils set has everything you need, It’s an ideal gift for Mother’s Day, Christmas, as a housewarming present and more.

【VERSATILE 22PCS KITCHEN UTENSILS SET】we have selected this 22PCS silicone cooking utensil sets for you that is dedicated to cooking. This means you don’t have to spend extra money on repetitive utensil tools. Essential kitchen Tools Includes 1 x Ladle,1 x Pasta Fork,1 x Spoonula, 1 x Slotted Spoon,1 x Kitchen Tong,1 x Slotted turner,1 x Whisk,1 x Brush,1 x Large Spatula,1 x Small Spatula,1 x Egg Separator,1 x Holder, 5 x measuring spoons, 5 x measuring cups

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this, the material is good and looks great, it’s a complete set with the necessary things for cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my new cookware. Very sturdy and clean easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Utensils are not cheap and flimsy. They are sturdy and nice. Comes with a lot of utensils!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean.
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate the design and functionality of these utensils. Their aesthetic appeal and ease of cleaning have impressed me. Initially, I hesitated to choose white utensils, fearing stains from spices or food coloring. However, I was pleasantly surprised by how easily they clean. Additionally, their notable heat resistance sets them apart.I've had experiences with spatulas that melted when accidentally touching hot pots or pans during cooking, but these utensils have proven resilient. They strike a perfect balance—neither too hard nor too soft—offering sturdiness and ease of use and cleaning.Despite these positive aspects, I deducted one star. One of the issues was receiving a soup ladle with imperfections at the top.. I believe thorough product inspections before shipment can address such issues.Moreover, the plastic container provided is not sturdy enough; it would benefit from being wider or made of heavier plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and doesnt get stained easily
reviews.reviewText: I loved this set compared to the other set with half wooden handle that’s weak on the joint. This set is sturdy, easy to wash, doesnt get stained with sauces, and very gentle with my Hexclad. So far so good, I have not regrets buying it. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great alternative to metal
reviews.reviewText: lots of useful utensils and color was perfect/true to what was ordered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color not the same
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed in the color. The pictures show this nice bright pink which is what I was looking for but the color is not bright. The color is more mauve or rose. I will keep it because not worth the hassle of returning it. I tried to upload a photo but won't give Amazon access to my all my photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cooking utensils
reviews.reviewText: They sit well in my hand and have a nice feel to them. I would recommend these. Good bang for your buck.

Love these! Will definitely buy again, the price is fantastic and the quality is superb. Love the variety of colors to choose from. Would make a great house warming gift too! They are easy to clean and I have'nt reached for any other of my previous untensils since.
Son de silicon de buena calidad, el color real si es caqui, no tan claro como se ve en la imagen.
Super Produkt , liegt toll in der Hand und verfärbt sich (ich hab weiß ) nicht ! Sehr schön und viel Zubehör!! Gerne wieder !
This utensil set is excellent, it meets just about all utensil needs for any well stocked kitchen. Added bonus the holder. Very happy with this purchase

The utensils are well made and they have lived up to our expectations so far. The holder that comes with them is quite small and flimsy so we purchased a separate black utensil holder to put the utensils in. Overall they are worth the money paid and we are happy with the quality.
